resources.string: Helios needs permission to access your device\'s location.
Helios requires location services to be enabled.

Hail unto Thee who art %1$s in Thy %2$s, even unto Thee who art %1$s in Thy %3$s, who travellest over the Heavens in Thy bark at the %4$s of the Sun. Tahuti standeth in His splendour at the prow, and Ra-Hoor abideth at the helm. Hail unto Thee from the Abodes of %5$s!
